languages.text:
Shoots the {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} in sensory overload mode.
In this mode, the lance weapon suffers a −15% penalty to hit chance but inflicts the sensory overload effect on its target. This effect significantly reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} for the next round.

traits.locale_text:
Fires lances in Sensors Overload mode.
This mode suffers -10% hit chances but applies Sensor Overload effect on target wich greatly reduces its maneuverability for next round.

Shoots the lance weapon in sensory overload mode.
In this mode, the lance weapon suffers a −15% penalty to hit chance but inflicts the sensory overload effect on its target. This effect significantly reduces the target's manoeuvrability for the next round.

In this mode, the lance weapon suffers a −15% penalty to hit chance but inflicts the sensory overload effect on its target. This effect significantly reduces the target's manoeuvrability for the next round.

languages.text:
Позволяет использовать {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}лэнс-излучатели{/g} в режиме сенсорной перегрузки.
В этом режиме лэнс-излучатели получают штраф −15% к попаданию, но накладывают на цель сенсорную перегрузку. Этот эффект существенно сокращает {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}маневренность{/g} цели в следующем раунде.
languages.original_text:
Shoots the {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} in sensory overload mode.
In this mode, the lance weapon suffers a −15% penalty to hit chance but inflicts the sensory overload effect on its target. This effect significantly reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} for the next round.

traits.locale_text:
Позволяет использовать лэнс-излучатели в режиме сенсорной перегрузки.
В этом режиме лэнс-излучатели получают штраф −15% к попаданию, но накладывают на цель сенсорную перегрузку. Этот эффект существенно сокращает маневренность цели в следующем раунде.

Позволяет использовать лэнс-излучатели в режиме сенсорной перегрузки.
В этом режиме лэнс-излучатели получают штраф −15% к попаданию, но накладывают на цель сенсорную перегрузку. Этот эффект существенно сокращает маневренность цели в следующем раунде.

languages.text:
Feuert mit der {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}Lanzenwaffe{/g} im sensorischen Überlastungsmodus.
In diesem Modus hat die Lanzenwaffe einen Abzug von −15 % auf ihre Trefferchance, aber sie belegt das Ziel mit dem Effekt "Sensorische Überlastung". Dieser Effekt reduziert die {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}Manövrierbarkeit{/g} des Ziels in der nächsten Runde deutlich.
languages.original_text:
Shoots the {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} in sensory overload mode.
In this mode, the lance weapon suffers a −15% penalty to hit chance but inflicts the sensory overload effect on its target. This effect significantly reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} for the next round.

traits.locale_text:
Feuert mit der {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}Lanzenwaffe{/g} im sensorischen Überlastungsmodus.
In diesem Modus hat die Lanzenwaffe einen Abzug von -15 % auf ihre Trefferchance, aber sie belegt das Ziel mit dem Effekt "Sensorische Überlastung". Dieser Effekt reduziert die {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}Manövrierbarkeit{/g} des Ziels in der nächsten Runde deutlich.

languages.text:
Tire la {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance{/g} en mode Surcharge sensorielle.
En mode Surcharge sensorielle, les lances subissent une pénalité de −15 % à leurs chances de toucher, mais infligent l'effet Surcharge sensorielle à leur cible, ce qui réduit leur {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manœuvrabilité{/g} de manière significative lors du prochain round.
languages.original_text:
Shoots the {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} in sensory overload mode.
In this mode, the lance weapon suffers a −15% penalty to hit chance but inflicts the sensory overload effect on its target. This effect significantly reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} for the next round.

traits.locale_text:
Tire la {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance{/g} en mode Surcharge sensorielle.
En mode Surcharge sensorielle, les lances subissent une pénalité de -15 % à leurs chances d'infliger un coup, mais infligent l'effet Surcharge sensorielle à leur cible, ce qui réduit leur {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manœuvrabilité{/g} de manière significative lors du prochain round.

Tire la {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance{/g} en mode Surcharge sensorielle.
En mode Surcharge sensorielle, les lances subissent une pénalité de -15 % à leurs chances d'infliger un coup, mais infligent l'effet Surcharge sensorielle à leur cible, ce qui réduit leur {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manœuvrabilité{/g} de manière significative lors du prochain round.

languages.text:
Dispara el {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}arma de lanza{/g} en modalidad de sobrecarga sensorial.
En esta modalidad, el arma de lanza sufre una penalización de −15 % a la probabilidad de impacto, pero causa un efecto de sobrecarga sensorial en el blanco. Este efecto reduce de manera significativa la {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}maniobrabilidad{/g} del blanco durante el siguiente asalto.
languages.original_text:
Shoots the {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} in sensory overload mode.
In this mode, the lance weapon suffers a −15% penalty to hit chance but inflicts the sensory overload effect on its target. This effect significantly reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} for the next round.

traits.locale_text:
Dispara el {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}arma de lanza{/g} en modalidad de sobrecarga sensorial.
En esta modalidad, el arma de lanza sufre una penalización de −15 % a la probabilidad de impacto, pero causa un efecto de sobrecarga sensorial en el blanco. Este efecto reduce de manera significativa la {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}maniobrabilidad{/g} del blanco durante el siguiente asalto.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}ランスウェポン{/g}を感覚過負荷モードで発射する。
このモードでは、ランスウェポンは命中確率に-15％のペナルティを受けるが、ターゲットに感覚過負荷効果を与える。この効果は、次のラウンドの間、対象の{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}操縦性{/g}を著しく低下させる。
languages.original_text:
Shoots the {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} in sensory overload mode.
In this mode, the lance weapon suffers a −15% penalty to hit chance but inflicts the sensory overload effect on its target. This effect significantly reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} for the next round.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}ランスウェポン{/g}を感覚過負荷モードで発射する。
このモードでは、ランスウェポンは命中確率に-15％のペナルティを受けるが、ターゲットに感覚過負荷効果を与える。この効果は、次のラウンドの間、対象の{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}操縦性{/g}を著しく低下させる。

languages.text:
在感官过载模式下发射{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}光矛武器{/g}。
在感官过载模式下，光矛武器的命中率会降低15%，但会对目标造成“感官过载”效果，显著降低目标下一轮的{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}机动性{/g}。
languages.original_text:
Shoots the {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} in sensory overload mode.
In this mode, the lance weapon suffers a −15% penalty to hit chance but inflicts the sensory overload effect on its target. This effect significantly reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} for the next round.

traits.locale_text:
在感官过载模式下发射{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}光矛武器{/g}。
在感官过载模式下，光矛武器的命中率会降低15%，但会对目标造成“感官过载”效果，显著降低目标下一轮的{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}机动性{/g}。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}Mızrak silahını{/g} sensörel fazla yükleme modunda ateşler.
Mızrak silahı, bu moddayken vuruş olasılığına −%15 ceza puanı alır ancak hedefi üzerinde sensörel fazla yükleme etkisi oluşturur. Bu etki, bir sonraki rauntta hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manevra kabiliyetini{/g} önemli ölçüde azaltır.
languages.original_text:
Shoots the {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} in sensory overload mode.
In this mode, the lance weapon suffers a −15% penalty to hit chance but inflicts the sensory overload effect on its target. This effect significantly reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} for the next round.
